mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: Axignis supports companies and establishments receiving the public (ERP) in regulatory compliance concerning fire safety and accessibility for people with disabilities.
mission.description2: Thanks to recognized expertise, Axignis offers comprehensive support, from design to final acceptance of projects.

items.title: Safety Register
items.description: Digital and automated management of mandatory registers with integrated alerts and monitoring for permanent compliance.

items.title: SSI Coordination
items.description: Expert support in all phases: design, implementation and acceptance of the Fire Safety System.

items.title: Technical Database
items.description: Secure centralization of technical information, user manuals and certificates for safety equipment.

founder.title: About the founder

founder.description: Founder and expert in fire safety and accessibility, Loïc Rome has been supporting companies in their regulatory procedures since 2017 with passion and expertise.
